source.oracleReaderQuery:
SELECT 
a.sku
,a.mate_nm
,a.due_dt
,a.main_comp
,a.main_comp2
,a.rpst_img
,a.stop_stat_all
,a.reg_yn
,a.pl_code_g_nm
,a.pl_code_p_nm
,a.img_s
,a.hitcnt
,a.use_yn
,a.upd_dt
,a.reg_dt
,a.plm_flag
,a.label_img
,a.alg_info3
,a.alg_info5
,a.alg_info6
,b.role_script
,b.sell_point
,b.food_type
,b.cptt_1st_good
,b.cptt_vs_fort
FROM CD_WEITEM.TB_PRDT_INFO_SKU_MASTER a, CD_WEITEM.TB_PRDT_INFO_MASTER  b
WHERE a.sku = b.sku(+)
